about_paragraph1: I am a Computer Science Technology student and a Full Stack developer passionate about learning and web development. What motivates me most is constantly discovering, understanding, and learning.
about_paragraph2: Outside of IT, I love skiing, traveling, and exploring new cultures, as it broadens my horizons and allows me to see the world differently.
contact_info_text: Feel free to reach out to me through any of the following channels. I will respond as soon as possible!
